name: Michael Howell From Capital Wars
title: Global Liquidity Watch Weekly Update
text:
Synopsis
Central bank liquidity is recovering, which could support risk assets, cryptocurrencies, and gold markets as we move towards Spring, with expected further expansion of liquidity before peaking in Q4 2024.

Key Insights
- Central bank liquidity has recovered from its early January dip
- Collateral values have increased
- Bond market volatility has decreased
- US dollar has lost some momentum
- Risk assets, gold, and cryptocurrencies have recently lost momentum due to liquidity slowdown that started in October 2024
- Current liquidity recovery, if maintained, is expected to be supportive for markets
- Liquidity is projected to expand further in 2024, potentially peaking in Q4
